descriptionHtml:
Blade of Sacrifice is now enchantable

So I did the related quest early on, maybe level 15 or so. I diligently collected all the Blades of Sacrifice available to me. Got my grand soul gems, headed over to the college, went up to the enchanting table and wtf?

This mod does the following:
-Makes the Blade of sacrifice enchantable
-Increases base damage to 12, up from 10, one higher from daedric
-Increased the weapon speed to 1.3 (same as all daggers \'cept ebony)
-Blade is upgradable, requires ebony ingot (same as daedric)
-Unrelated, but I also changed ebony dagger\'s speed to 1.3

My reasoning behind making this dagger have a stronger base damage than the best vanilla dagger (daedric) was that these blades were given directly by a daedric prince to her followers. It stands to reason that these blades would be at least as powerful as a regular daedric dagger that you can find in the world or even craft yourself. There are only a few in the world (maybe 10? I have 6), and they are not sold by vendors or found as loot.

I suppose this mod will make the related quest *slightly* more difficult if it has not been completed yet.

Conflicts: Likely none

Install: NMM

Uninstall: NMM

Future plans?
If I get really bored i might change the upgrade material from ebony ingot to human heart

Permissions:
Ask to use
Do not upload to other sites

Please endorse if you like
author: tg08096
